name: .20 SUMY NONA zine, NOVEMBER 2020, EDITIE 1.0 (genesis issue & NFT)
description:
note: some genesis issues were handstamped, such as the one shown in the cover pic.

SUMY NONA is a 22 page, A5 size, "anonymous", mixed-media, (underground) zine for the area of Delft, Netherlands (and worldwide friends thereof). Anonymus is the latin word for anonymous and all the submissions are anonymous or utilizing a pseudonym, hence the name. Truly free!

there is no website, no social media, no twittering, no nonprofit org,  just an artist (with formerly one enthusiastic supporter on patreon.com) footing the bill mostly. they had to stop september 2021, so now we are print-on-demand and mostly digital. thankfully NFTs are starting to already offer hope, with some action starting in that field.

VERY IMPORTANT PLEASE READ >>>> FOR THE PRINT ON DEMAND OR PDF FILE OF THE ZINE SENT TO YOU - WILL NEED YOUR PERSONAL INFO FOR SNAIL MAIL PLZ. email sumynonazine at pm dot me
